document_data.name: Resengar
document_data.mainbody: '''Resengar''', also known as Resengar the Whitebeard, was a [[wizard]] from [[Waterdeep]] and a [[Masked Lord]] until {{yearlink|1355}}.
document_data.Abilities: One of his [[cantrip]]s created seven stars.
document_data.Relationships: He was a friend of [[Mirt]], and the one fellow he liked the most amongst the other [[Masked Lords]] after [[Durnan]]. Resengar liked to show off his cantrips to [[Asper]].
document_data.Possessions: His home was warded with magic. In his living room, he had at least one fur rug and a ceiling decorated with stars.
document_data.History: In {{yearlinkName|1355}}, Resengar was slain by [[Amril Zoar]] just before he slew [[Tamaeril Bladesemmer]].
